sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, Title, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img, } from './infoElements' const HeroSection = ({titulo,descrip,butonLabel,img,imgStart,darkText}) => { return ( <> {titulo} {descrip} {butonLabel} ) } export default HeroSection
